texts.name: Buzzer
texts.biography: Buzzer, a slender yet influential wasp hero, commands respect with his sharp mind and strategic prowess. Despite his lean form, he possesses the power to summon a swarm of wasp sentries, creating a formidable defense on the battlefield. His tactical brilliance ensures his enemies are constantly surrounded by a relentless, ever-watchful army.

specialty.description: Casts Summon Wasp Sentry spell with increased effect.
